name: Deadlocked
description:
Immerse yourself in the intense world of Deadlocked, a thrilling top-down shooter that pits you against relentless waves of robotic foes— battle through futuristic environments, utilizing an arsenal of powerful weapons and unique abilities.



Strategically dodge, shoot, and obliterate enemies while uncovering the mysteries of Deadlocked. Unleash your skills in fast-paced combat, conquer challenging levels, and customize your character. With fun visuals, responsive gameplay and multiple loadout possibilities, Deadlocked offers an electrifying experience for those seeking high-octane action.
